cheat.description: 1 foul loses the game (instead of 3) - only in 10-ball in party mode
2 fouls in a row loses the game - only on 9 and 10-ball in party mode
Fouls don't count - only on 9 and 10-ball and rotation in party mode
Number of fouls is not cleared after a good shot (3 fouls don't have to be in a row to lose) - only on 10-ball in party mode
Always break in 9 or 10-ball (2 of 2) - P1
Always break in 9 or 10-ball (2 of 2) - P2
